r.d: oEmbed (http://www.oembed.com) is an open specification for discovering more information about URI's. oEmbed services return structure meta-data about a URI (e.g. type of object, title, author information, thumbnail details, etc.).
r.n: * Fixes E_STRICT warnings, per #18042 * Removed dependency on PEAR_Exception * Removed dependency on HTTP_Request (lingering require_once) * Added support for phpunit 3.5 * Added generatePackage.php for easy package maintenance
